calculus.detailed_description: Understands basic ideas such as functions and limits, but is not confident with derivative rules, chain rule, or problem-solving applications.

algebra.detailed_description: Comfortable with equations, manipulating expressions, and basic functions; can simplify moderately complex algebraic forms.

astronomy.detailed_description: Knows basic celestial objects (stars, planets, galaxies) but has limited understanding of astrophysics concepts, orbital mechanics, or observational techniques.

general_science.detailed_description: Has a broad understanding of scientific reasoning and core topics (physics, chemistry, biology) at a conceptual level, but lacks advanced technical depth.
